resources.string: For sure nigga, we smoke weed everdaaaay!!

string-array.name: snoopLines
string-array.item: For sure nigga, we smoke weed everydaaaay!!
Yeeeeeeee for shizzle :)
So what we get drunk? So what we smoke weeed....
The D O double G always wants to smoke bruh
Is that broccoli in your cigarette bro?
I just wanna smoke and chill maaan
Put your Lighters up! Get high with me, fly with me!
Let\'s roll up some, let\'s blow up some...

string-array.name: timeLines
string-array.item: It\'s spliff o\'Clock!
It\'s time to smoke some weeeeed!!
We smoke all day, why u even ask bro
It\'s half past Blunt bruh
Let\'s get high RIGHT NOW
Time to get stoned :D
Rise and shine, it\'s marijuana time!
Time to get high with me
Save the drama for your mama, it\'s time to smoke some marijuana
Wake & Bake?
I love smoking weed after a long day of smoking weed...
A friend with weed is a friend indeed.
